name: O Conto: Filho de Hira
description:
Introduction:

His name is Krizz and Hira calls you by silent night,something or somehere entered your homeland,ready to shake your peace,so,wake up,and find a pacific end for all this!

Grafics:

based on sprites made by pixel art techniques,the game run in native resolution 1280x720 pixels(720p).

Songs:

Create by Jamie Nord

Controls:

UpArrow,Z: Jump

RightArrow,LeftArrow:Move

X: Punch

Sound icon:turn on/off music

Email for contatc:

nomadnatan@gmail.com

Enjoy!
